title: Service disruption due to train fault between Bukit Panjang & Phoenix

updates.text: [BPLRT] UPDATE: Train services have resumed. Free regular bus services and bus bridging services have ceased.
[BPLRT] UPDATE: Train services have resumed. Free regular bus svcs and bus bridging services are still available at all BPLRT stations.
[BPLRT] UPDATE: Train services have resumed. Free regular bus svcs are still available at all BPLRT stations.
[BPLRT] UPDATE: Train service estimated to resume within the next 30 minutes. Free regular bus svcs still available at all BPLRT stations.
[BPLRT] UPDATE: No train svc on the BPLRT. We are working to recover the svc. Free regular bus services are available at all BPLRT stations.
[BPLRT] Due to a train fault between #BukitPanjang & #Phoenix. BPLRT train svc will be delayed for 30 mins. We are working to recover svc.
